newsitem.title: USA: GATX unit in joint venture in Chile.
newsitem.headline: GATX unit in joint venture in Chile.

text.p: GATX Logistics Inc, a unit of GATX Inc, said in a release received here that it formed a joint venture with Wackenhut de Chile S.A. and its affiliatled companies to provide logistics services in Chile.
The new venture, GATX Logistics Chile S.A., is one of Chile's first full-service, third-party logistics providers. It is GATX Logistics' first service offering beyond North America.
Terms provide for GATX Logistics to provide the services and Wackenhut de Chile will provide local expertise regarding the country, client contacts, labor management and administrative support.
